issue.title: When the `localName` property of `@JacksonXmlProperty` is not set, the `required` of `@JsonProperty` does not detect the property name of POJO

repository.name: jackson-dataformat-xml
repository.description: Extension for Jackson JSON processor that adds support for serializing POJOs as XML (and deserializing from XML) as an alternative to JSON

body: @cowtowncoder Thanks for the response. Actually I only need one, but I have not found a way to disable the default annotation processor, which seems to be somewhat "hardcoded" in the `basicConfig` when constructing an `ObjectMapper`. But let's maybe continue this thread in the new issue.

issue.title: No way to explicitly disable wrapping in custom annotation processor

repository.name: jackson-databind
repository.description: General data-binding package for Jackson (2.x): works on streaming API (core) implementation(s)

body: NOTE: #4595 changes behavior for 2.17.2 to not merge `NO_NAME` case.
